verbose_text: Moreover, the downstream splicing of X-box binding protein 1 (Xbp1) in Matn3 V194D chondrocytes (and also in cell models) is symbolic of classical UPR; however, this prolonged ER stress does not result in a C/EBP-homologous protein (CHOP)-mediated increase in apoptosis (and our unpublished observations).
evidence: ER stress does not result in a C/EBP-homologous protein (CHOP)-mediated increase
